ingredients.item: 1 essential Waitrose Orange or 2 Waitrose Foundation Satsumas, segmented
200g frozen essential Waitrose Cooked King Prawns, defrosted
1 tbsp juice and zest of ½ essential Waitrose Lemon
1 tbsp essential Waitrose Half Fat Mayonnaise

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the pepper for 1–2 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl and add the tomatoes, orange segments and prawns.
Whisk the lemon zest and juice with the mayonnaise and toss into the salad with the wild rocket.
